hooks.pre-commit: run-p build:*:markdown && git add terms.md order-form.md

scripts.build:terms:markdown: commonform render -f markdown --title 'Software Support Terms' terms.cform > terms.md
scripts.build:terms:html: commonform render -f html5 --title 'Software Support Terms' --ordered-lists terms.cform > terms.html
scripts.build:terms:docx: commonform render -f docx --title 'Software Support Terms' --number outline --left-align-title --indent-margins --styles styles.json terms.cform > terms.docx
scripts.build:orderform:markdown: commonform render -f markdown --title 'Software Support Order Form' order-form.cform > order-form.md
scripts.build:orderform:html: commonform render -f html5 --title 'Software Support Order Form' --ordered-lists order-form.cform > order-form.html
scripts.build:orderform:docx: commonform render -f docx --title 'Software Support Order Form' --number outline --left-align-title --indent-margins --styles styles.json --signatures signatures.json order-form.cform > order-form.docx
scripts.build:example:docx: commonform render -f docx --title 'Software Support Order Form' --number outline --left-align-title --indent-margins --styles styles.json --signatures signatures.json --blanks example-order-form.json --blank-text 'according to the Software Support Terms' order-form.cform > example-order-form.docx
